text: The Associated Press is an independent global news organization dedicated to factual reporting. Founded in 1846, AP today remains the most trusted source of fast, accurate, unbiased news in all formats and the essential provider of the technology and services vital to the news business. More than half the world’s population sees AP journalism every day.
title: Pink to get Michael Jackson Video Vanguard Award at MTV VMAs

og.title: Pink to get Michael Jackson Video Vanguard Award at MTV VMAs
og.description: Pink will be honored with the Michael Jackson Video Vanguard Award at the MTV Video Music Awards. She will receive the honor Aug. 27 at the Forum in Inglewood, California.

twitter.description: Pink will be honored with the Michael Jackson Video Vanguard Award at the MTV Video Music Awards. She will receive the honor Aug. 27 at the Forum in Inglewood, California.
